fields.description:
*1. Narrative*
*As a user* who taps 'change' on the pax carousel
*I want* the seatmap to automatically scroll to the seat
*so that I* know which seat I'm changing

*2. Visuals*
[https://ryanair.invisionapp.com/boards/W63O0SPXFAM/] 

*3. Business Rules*
[https://confluence.ryanair.com:8444/display/RYR3/4.+Seats] 

*4. Acceptance Criteria*
# When I tap on 'change' in the PAX carousel, the seatmap should scroll to display the seat to be changed. 
# When I tap on 'remove' the seatmap doesn't scroll.

items.from:
[~conkicj_ctr] I have a question regarding this - How are we going to verify that seat has been added *correctly* to basket on selecting yes?
 We are redirected to PT page on selecting yes and there under checkout section we can just verify seat has been added (not which seat number has been added).

 

*NOTE* : Price is updated correctly, my concern is only about which seat has been added.

 

!screenshot-1.png|thumbnail!

 

FYI - [~adubav] & [~carbolm]

fields.description:
h3. *1. Narrative*
*As a user* on the seat map that has a flight with multiple adult passengers
 *I want* able to be able to change or remove my seat
 *So that* I can easily change my selection

h3. *2. Visuals*
[https://ryanair.invisionapp.com/boards/W63O0SPXFAM/] 
[https://ryanair.invisionapp.com/boards/W63O0SPXFAM/#/6159625/183137556]

h3. *3. Business rules*
[https://confluence.ryanair.com:8444/display/RYR3/4.+Seats] 

h3. *4. Acceptance criteria*
# Once a passenger has a seat in the passenger carousel, I will see the 'change' CTA next to their seat
# If I tap on this PAX to select them in the carousel the 'change' CTA will show as 'Remove'
# Tapping on this will remove the selected seat for that PAX

fields.description:
h3. *1. Narrative*
*As a user* on the seatmap with a multi-pax booking, who has made seat selections
 *I want* to be able to see the price updated in the header and global basket
 *So that* I know seats have been added and their cost.

h3. *2. Visuals*
https://ryanair.invisionapp.com/boards/W63O0SPXFAM/#/6159625/187655060

h3. *3. Business rules*
[https://confluence.ryanair.com:8444/display/RYR3/4.+Seats] 

h3. *4. Acceptance criteria*
# When seats are selected, the price must be updated in the header and the global basket must be updated.
# These seats will have a separate line item in the global basket, and must be displayed with their associated price. 
# If seats are added for both legs, then this must appear as a line item for each leg. 
# Tapping the 'x' will allow for the seats to be removed from the booking.
# If I remove the seats, the global basket will update with the correct price.

fields.description:
h3. *1. Narrative*
*As a user* on the Seat Map
*I want to* be able to track user actions and tendencies
*So that* I gain an understanding of customer needs.

+Purpose of the Story+
Gain an understanding of user behaviour but mask all customer data. 

h3. *2. Visuals*

h3. *3. Business Rules*
# Ensure HotJar is used on the Seat Map page, to track and monitor user interactions. 
# All customer data should be masked when doing this. 
# Hotjar config can be found here:  https://confluence.ryanair.com:8444/display/RYR3/Hotjar+configurations

h3. *3. Business rules*

h3. *4. Acceptance criteria*
 # As a user that has landed on the seat map I want to see a price tag on the grouping of seats at each price level
 # -If seats are included in the fare I've selected, then this will be displayed instead of a price.- This accepetance criteria will be covered off in another story.

fields.description:
*Purpose of the story*

To provide seat map data from the dotrez API, as opposed to having logic on the front end. This will reduce complexity on the front end and increase performance of the seat map as a result. 

The other advantage is that we will be able to show the cheapest seat price offered for every passenger which we can't do today. 

+Technical Documentation+

[https://confluence.ryanair.com:8444/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=SDEV&title=Get+Seat+V5] 

 

+Business Rules+

There will be no change to the business rules, they are outlined here just for clarification purposes:

[https://confluence.ryanair.com:8444/display/RYR3/4.+Seats]

 

Data provided from API

 *So that* I can make the selection that I need

[https://confluence.ryanair.com:8444/display/RYR3/4.+Seats]

 # The user can swipe across the carousel.

items.fromString:
h3.  *1. Narrative*

*As a user* on the seat map 
 *I want* able to see the whole seat map 
 *So that* I can make the selection that I need
h3. *2. Visuals*

[https://ryanair.invisionapp.com/boards/W63O0SPXFAM/] 
h3. *3. Business rules*

[https://confluence.ryanair.com:8444/display/RYR3/4.+Seats] 
h3. *4. Acceptance criteria*
 # When the user lands on the page the 'Skip' CTA and legen will be displayed
 # As the user scrolls down the page the Skip CTA and legend must slide away from view via the bottom of the page
 # As the user scrolls up the Skip CTA and legend must slide back into view from the bottom of the page.

fields.description:
h3. *1. Narrative*
*As a user* on the seat map 
 *I want* able to see the whole seat map 
 *So that* I can make the selection that I need

h3. *2. Visuals*
[https://ryanair.invisionapp.com/boards/W63O0SPXFAM/] 

h3. *3. Business rules*
[https://confluence.ryanair.com:8444/display/RYR3/4.+Seats] 

h3. *4. Acceptance criteria*
# When the user lands on the page the CTA (Skip,Continue) and legend will be displayed
# As the user scrolls down the page the CTA and legend must slide away from view via the bottom of the page
# As the user scrolls up the CTA and legend must slide back into view from the bottom of the page. 
# Once the user has selected a seat for 1 passenger, the Skip CTA will change to 'Continue/Next flight' CTA. 
# If you've selected a seat for all passengers, the CTA and legend will automatically appear without scrolling so the user can move to the next page. If you start scrolling again after this it won't disappear.

h3. *1. Narrative*

*As a user* landing on the seatmap with an infant on the booking
 *I want* to see which seats are available for an infant
 *So that* I know which seats I can select
h3. *2. Visuals*

[https://ryanair.invisionapp.com/boards/W63O0SPXFAM/] 
h3. *3. Business rules*

[https://confluence.ryanair.com:8444/display/RYR3/4.+Seats] 
h3. *4. Acceptance criteria*
# Display the infant icon on seats that are applicable for an infant.
# If a seat is selected that is not suitable for an infant, then a popup will display.
# Tapping select a seat on the popup will take me back to the seatmap to select a seat.

h3. *1. Narrative*

*As a user* on the seat map that has a passenger that requires special assistance 
 *I want* to know which seats are eligble for selection
 *So that* I know which seats can be selected. 
h3. *2. Visuals*

[https://ryanair.invisionapp.com/boards/W63O0SPXFAM/#/6159625/183249942/ |https://ryanair.invisionapp.com/boards/W63O0SPXFAM/#/6159625/183249942]
h3. *3. Business rules*

[https://confluence.ryanair.com:8444/display/RYR3/4.+Seats] 
h3. *4. Acceptance criteria*
 # If a user has selected special assistance for a passenger on the 'Add passenger' page, they must not be able to select a seat in the emergency rows (including 1 row in front and 1 row behind)
 # If a user selects a seat in the emergency rows for a passenger who requires special assistance, the message in the visuals must be displayed. 
 # When the user selects 'Select new seat', the message must dissapear and the seat map must be displayed.

h3. *1. Narrative*

*As a user* on the seat map who has removed seats from their basket
 *I want* to be able to see the price updated in the header and global basket
 *So that* I know the cost
h3. *2. Visuals*

 # When a seat is selected, the price must be updated in the header and the global basket must be updated.
 # The user must be able to remove the seat by tapping the 'x' in the price breakdown - this will remove their seat selection and the total price must be updated accordingly.

*As a user* on the seat map that that has made a seat selection
 *I want* to be able to see the price updated in the header and global basket
 *So that* I know the cost
h3. *2. Visuals*

[https://ryanair.invisionapp.com/boards/W63O0SPXFAM/] 
h3. *3. Business rules*

[https://confluence.ryanair.com:8444/display/RYR3/4.+Seats] 
h3. *4. Acceptance criteria*
 # When a seat is selected, the price must be updated in the header and the global basket must be updated.
 # Where a seat is included in the price, the 'Included' wording must be displayed
 # Where a seat is not included, the seat price must be displayed. 
 # User must also be able to remove seats from the the global basket.

fields.description:
h3. *1. Narrative*

*As a user* on the seat map that has a flight with multiple adult passengers
 *I want* able to see on the carousel which PAX have seats selected
 *So that* I know which PAX still need seats. 

h3. *2. Visuals*
[https://ryanair.invisionapp.com/boards/W63O0SPXFAM/] 
[https://ryanair.invisionapp.com/boards/W63O0SPXFAM/#/6159625/183137556]

h3. *3. Business rules*
[https://confluence.ryanair.com:8444/display/RYR3/4.+Seats] 

h3. *4. Acceptance criteria*
 # When a user selects a seat for the passenger that is highlighted, the seat number must be displayed in the passenger carousel e.g. 6A
 # If a user selects a seat for passenger 2 initially, the first passenger must be highlighted or the next available passenger that does not have a seat, highlighting will work from left to right. 
 # If the user selects 'Change' on the carousel, the passenger will be highlighted in the carousel, the seat that was previously selected will pulse, and the user can select a different seat for that passenger by tapping on another seat. 
 # If the user taps a seat already selected, this will undo the selection, this passenger will be highlighted in the carousel, and the user can select another seat for that passenger.

items.toString:
h3. *1. Narrative*

*As a user* on the seat map that has a flight with multiple adult passengers
 *I want* able to select seats for all passengers
 *So that* I can choose a seat for each passenger
h3. *2. Visuals*

[https://ryanair.invisionapp.com/boards/W63O0SPXFAM/] 
h3. *3. Business rules*

[https://confluence.ryanair.com:8444/display/RYR3/4.+Seats] 
h3. *4. Acceptance criteria*
 # When a user selects a seat, for the passenger that is highlighted, the seat number must be displayed in the passenger carousel e.g. 6A
 # When a seat is selected for 1 passenger, the 'Skip' CTA must be replaced with the 'Next flight'/Continue' CTA
 # If a user selects a seat for passenger 3 initially, the first passenger must be highlighted or the next available passenger that does not have a seat, highlighting will work from left to right. 
 # If the user selects 'Change' on the carousel, the passenger will be highlighted in the carousel and the seat that was previously selected will pulse and the user can select another seat for that passenger.

[https://confluence.ryanair.com:8444/display/RYR3/4.+Seats] 

h3. *4. Acceptance criteria*
 # When a user selects a seat for the passenger that is highlighted, the seat number must be displayed in the passenger carousel e.g. 6A
 # If a user selects a seat for passenger 2 initially, the first passenger must be highlighted or the next available passenger that does not have a seat, highlighting will work from left to right. 
 # If the user selects 'Change' on the carousel, the passenger will be highlighted in the carousel, the seat that was previously selected will pulse, and the user can select a different seat for that passenger by tapping on another seat. 
 # If the user taps a seat already selected, this will undo the selection, this passenger will be highlighted in the carousel, and the user can select another seat for that passenger.
